about_the_game: The original soundtrack to Gjallarhorn features over a half hour of symphonic music with a total of (21) songs. The soundtrack was originally created with an idea of synergy between the four starting areas and draws inspiration from the older D20 classic games on the Sega Genesis and SNES. The soundtrack was composed by Bryan Davis.

The soundtrack was composed by Bryan Davis.
